Products

Newcomers

MTM 18+ pioneered media technology monitoring in Canada 25 years ago. Annually surveying over 12,000 Canadians, MTM 18+ delivers accurate, comprehensive insights into technology ownership and usage.

Tools

Explore our suite of analytics, forecasting, and trending tools. Discover hidden patterns, anticipate market shifts, and maintain a competitive edge with our integrated solutions. Leverage data insights for confident decision-making.

Data Analysis Tool

The Data Analysis Tool (DAT) offers subscribers easy access to MTM JR. data. Customize analyses with numerous variables, access past data, explore markets, and run reports to reveal key insights.

Learn More

Want to know how many kids use cellphones? How many own phones? What they do on their phones? No need to look into a crystal ball...you just need to look into the Data Analysis tool for clear insights about the behaviours of kids and their prized possessions....electronic devices!
